participant_1.background:
I enjoy playing with my parrot Todd in my spare time.
I'm small, but I stand out in a crowd because I love wearing leather.
Football is my main focus, and I need to look my best to be successful.
my boyfriend is unemployed.
i like doing art projects.

participant_2.background:
I do my best in school, and I love to dance with my team when I have free time.
i am a professional gamer.
i want people to think i m cool.
i just started college.
my parents own a business that i m now running.

content.text: Hi how is your day going?
Good I just finished dancing with my team, how about you?
Not bad just doing some art projects while I'm waiting for my boyfriend to come home from work
Oh that's fun, I love to draw and paint! What kind of art projects are you doing?
I'm working on a painting of my parrot Todd. He's a really cool bird and I think he's really fun to draw
That's really cool! I love parrots, they're so smart and funny. I had a pet parrot when I was a kid
Oh really? What kind of parrot was it?
It was a green-cheeked conure. He was really friendly and loved to play
That sounds awesome, I love conures!
Yeah they're great pets. So what else do you like to do for fun?
I also like to play football, it's my main focus right now.
Oh that's cool, I've never played football but I've always wanted to try
You should! It's a lot of fun and it's a great way to stay in shape
Yeah I might have to give it a try sometime
Well I'm sure you'd be good at it
